Extract()[6/8] ExtractPhoton.Compression.PrimitiveSerializeExt Photon.Compression.PrimitiveSerializeExtExtract
static ulong Photon.Compression.PrimitiveSerializeExt.Extract (this ulong value, int bits, ref int bitposition)[static]
Extract (read/deserialize) a value from a source primitive (the buffer) by reading x bits starting at the bitposition, and return the reconstructed value.
Parameters
value
Source primitive buffer to read from.
bits
Number of lower order bits to copy from source to return value.
bitposition
Auto-incremented reference to the value read bit pointer. Extraction starts at this point in value.
Returns
Downcast this ulong return value to the desired type.

Inject (write/serialize) x bits of source value into a target primitive (the buffer) starting at bitposition.
Negative numbers will not serialize properly. Use InjectUnsigned for signed values.
Parameters
value
Value to write.
buffer
Target of write.
bitposition
Auto-incremented write position. Writing will begin at this position in the buffer, and this value will have bits added to it.
bits
Number of lower order bits to copy from source to target buffer.

static byte Photon.Compression.PrimitiveSerializeExt.Write (this byte buffer, ulong value, ref int bitposition, int bits = 64 )[static]
Primary Write x bits of source value into a target primitive (the buffer) starting at bitposition.
WARNING: Unlike Inject, Write passes the buffer by reference, so you MUST use the return value as the new buffer value.
Parameters
value
Value to write.
buffer
Target of write.
bitposition
Auto-incremented write position. Writing will begin at this position in the buffer, and this value will have bits added to it.
bits
Number of lower order bits to copy from source to target buffer.
Returns
Returns the modified buffer.
